column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had a very stuffy nose. After the first 24 hours, I was feeling better, but was hesitant to take then next dose. Woke up @ 4am, every monring on this med, feeling anxious, nervosue and sick to my stomache. It did what i needed it to, butthe side effects were horrible. I felt like I was on caffein pills.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had almost all of the side effects listed with this drug and I have never be alergic to any drugs before. My heartbeat was really fast my and I felt anxious. My hands were cold and clammy but I was sweaty almost everywhere else and it took me forever to fall asleep. However, I could breathe better through my nose but it was not nearly worth all the other things I went through. I will never take this drug again.

column2: snugglespa, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have been having problems with a stuffy nose at night and could not sleep because I could not breath. I tried nose sprays but got hooked and started to ruin my membranes in my nose. The doctor put me on this medication and the very first night I was amazed at how it cleared my nose right up. I used it for the 18 days I was suppose to and after that I have not had a stuffy nose again. I have not had to spray or use anything else since. I highly recommend it.

column2: cynthiajames, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I took this med after being diagnosed with a sinus infection- I felt better after the first pill. I finally got sleep after a runny nose kept me up for days. Sudefed doesn't even come close to the effectiveness of this drug. Highly recommend trying this med, especially if you are so fed up with your nose that you don't care that you'll be a little jittery and anxious. Actually the drug gave me the energy to make it through the day. The drug can be a tad bit addictive though, I recently had a cold and pulled out the pseudovent-it cured my cold after one use. I know you aren't supposed to keep meds but when you are sick and miserable you'll do anything to feel better, and it worked!

column2: AMB, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have taken this pill now for only 18 hours and it has done miracles for me. I cannot believe how well this has worked for me already.  To me, this is a miracle pill.
